entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:20 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:20 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
